Source.Name: profanity
Source.Summary: Profanity - A console based XMPP client
Source.Description: Profanity is a console based XMPP client written in C using ncurses and libstrophe, inspired by Irssi. Feautres: - Supports XMPP chat services, including GoogleTalk - MUC chat room support - OTR and PGP encryption - Roster management - Flexible resource and priority settings - Desktop notifications - Plugins in Python and C
